_header: Christ cross me speed and Saint Nicolas
Subjects: alphabetic poems; Passion; Christ, Passion of
_description: An ABC poem on the Passion — six stanzas rhyme royal

CamGon174.First Lines:
Cryste crosse me spede & seynt nycolasA b c d doth
                    syngnifye…
CamGon174.Last Lines:
…Onto hys fader that we myȝght reneWith hym the x y z and
                    est amen
CamGon174.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 5-6.
